page.title: 08OUR LEISURE SURVEY.
page.content: {On the 15th to the 24th of June 1985. 99 people watched T.V during the week and weekends.39 people went cycling. 37 people went walking.Board games were also played by 37 people.34 people watched videos.32 people played on computers.19 people swam.18 people had barbecues.16 people played tennis.14 people went to local pubs.12 people went on daytrips.7 people went fishing and 7 people went to farms.12 people went riding on ponies and horses.5 people went to the beach when it was nice.4 people went to parks or zoos.2 people went dry slope skiing.Some people only played tennis when the weather was nice.This survey only covers children and parents linked with Burley School. {by Jill Norcott and Jenice {Mortimer. }
